result.title: Database of petrophysical and fluid physical properties and recommendations for model parametrization of the four Variscan reservoir types
result.description: This deliverable sums up the results of all investigations within Task 51 and Task 32 needed for Task 52 in one comprehensive database cf Br et al 2017 and will give based on the collected data recommendations on how to statistically deal with the measurements to process them for model parametrization This will also be the basis the evaluate rock or reservoir heterogeneity and can allow for stochastic evaluation or modelling of the four Variscan reservoir types

result.description: The first geothermal school will be held in Cergy France in order to allow all of the MEET participants to meet and share their experience obtained during the first 24 months of the project and to learn more about geothermal energy exploration and production thanks to the invitation of experts In particular engineers as well as masters and PhD students involved in MEET will be invited to participate in this first school to learn and share their first results Cergy University UCP has all the facilities for hosting such a geothermal school

result.description: D.2.3 Case study 2 report “Strategic development of Pan-European network” (M36-IMPERIAL): Report related to T2.1.2,2.2,2.4. The report aims to describe the challenges in planning the Pan-European network with focus on the uncertainty, the solution approach and the key findings after analysing the results of the studies.
